Uses of Class
se.softhouse.jargo.ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder

  • Packages that use ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder 
    Package Description
    se.softhouse.jargo
    An argument and options parser for java

    • Uses of ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder in se.softhouse.jargo

      Methods in se.softhouse.jargo that return ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<T> ArgumentBuilder.arity(int numberOfParameters)
      Uses this argument to parse values but assumes that numberOfParameters of the following parameters are of the same type.
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<ParsedArguments> ArgumentBuilder.CommandBuilder.arity(int arity)
      Deprecated. 
      pass any Arguments to your Command to Command.Command(Argument...)
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<List<T>> ArgumentBuilder.RepeatedArgumentBuilder.arity(int numberOfParameters)
      Deprecated. 
      this method should be called before ArgumentBuilder.repeated()
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<Boolean> ArgumentBuilder.OptionArgumentBuilder.arity(int numberOfParameters)
      Deprecated. 
      an optional flag can only have an arity of zero
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<Map<K,V>> ArgumentBuilder.MapArgumentBuilder.arity(int nrOfParameters)
      Deprecated. 
      because ArgumentBuilder.MapArgumentBuilder.arity(int) should be called before ArgumentBuilder.asPropertyMap().
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<List<T>> ArgumentBuilder.SplitterArgumentBuilder.arity(int numberOfParameters)
      Deprecated. 
      you can't use both ArgumentBuilder.splitWith(String) and ArgumentBuilder.SplitterArgumentBuilder.arity(int)
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<T> ArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
      Useful for handling a variable amount of parameters in the end of a command.
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<ParsedArguments> ArgumentBuilder.CommandBuilder.variableArity()
      Deprecated. 
      pass any Arguments to your Command to Command.Command(Argument...)
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<List<T>> ArgumentBuilder.RepeatedArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
      Deprecated. 
      this method should be called before ArgumentBuilder.repeated()
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<Boolean> ArgumentBuilder.OptionArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
      Deprecated. 
      an optional flag can only have an arity of zero
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<Map<K,V>> ArgumentBuilder.MapArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
      Deprecated. 
      because ArgumentBuilder.asPropertyMap() is already of variable arity
      ArgumentBuilder.ArityArgumentBuilder<List<T>> ArgumentBuilder.SplitterArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
      Deprecated. 
      you can't use both ArgumentBuilder.splitWith(String) and ArgumentBuilder.SplitterArgumentBuilder.variableArity()
